name: Garlic and Cheese Bruschetta
author: STP
summary: Reduced fat ingredients make this yummy bruschetta especially loveable. Swiss cheese and onions lend their distinctive flavors to appetizers that are impossible to resist.
ingredients: 1 cup shredded reduced fat Swiss cheese
¼ cup freshly grated Parmesan cheese
2 (1 pound) loaves French bread, cut diagonally in 1 inch slices
directions: In a medium bowl, blend fat free cream cheese, nonfat sour cream and fat-free mayonnaise with an electric mixer until smooth
Stir in 1/2 the reduced fat Swiss cheese, Parmesan cheese, parsley, green onions and garlic
Arrange bread slices in a single layer on a medium baking sheet
Spread French bread slices with the cream cheese mixture
Broil under the preheated broiler approximately 1 1/2 minutes, until cheese is melted
Remove from heat and sprinkle with ground black pepper
